result.value: PopLDdecay: a fast and effective tool for linkage disequilibrium decay analysis based on variant call format(VCF) files
PopLDdecay: A new simple and efficient software for Linkage Disequilibrium Decay analysis based Variant Call Format

result.original_header: ################swimming in the sky and flying in the sea ###########################
result.value:
# PopLDdecay PopLDdecay: A new simple and efficient software for Linkage Disequilibrium Decay analysis based Variant Call Format
### 4) Compare result ------------ Used Data of this [web site](ftp://ftp.1000genomes.ebi.ac.uk/vol1/ftp/release/20130502) to test follow software, with only two based site in chr22 (minimal SNP database) of the [1000 Genomes Project](ftp://ftp.1000genomes.ebi.ac.uk/vol1/ftp/release/20130502/) ALL the pair-wise SNP R^2 is the same. ######################swimming in the sky and flying in the sea ########################### ##

result.original_header: ################swimming in the sky and flying in the sea ###########################
result.value:
### 1) Install ------------
Method1 For linux/Unix and macOS 
        git clone https://github.com/hewm2008/PopLDdecay.git
        chmod 755 configure; ./configure;
        make;
        mv PopLDdecay  bin/;    #     [rm *.o]
**Note:** If fail to link,try to re-install the libraries [**_zlib_**](https://zlib.net/) Method2 For linux/Unix and macOS 
        tar -zxvf  PopLDdecayXXX.tar.gz
        cd PopLDdecayXXX;
        cd src;
        make ; make clean                            # or [sh make.sh]
        ../bin/PopLDdecay
**Note:** If fail to link,try to re-install the libraries [**_zlib_**](https://zlib.net/) * 1) Calculate LD decay 
      # 1)  For gatk VCF file deal , run PopLDdecay  direct
            ./bin/PopLDdecay    -InVCF  SNP.vcf.gz  -OutStat LDdecay   
      # 2)  For plink [.ped .map], chang plink 2 genotype first  2) run PopLDdecay  
            perl bin/mis/plink2genotype.pl    -inPED in.ped -inMAP in.map  -outGenotype out.genotype ;      ./bin/PopLDdecay        -InGenotype out.genotype -OutStat LDdecay 
      # 3)  To Calculate the subgroup GroupA LDdecay in VCF Files   # put GroupA sample name into GroupA_sample.list
            ./bin/PopLDdecay   -InVCF    -OutStat    -SubPop    GroupA_sample.list
### 6) Discussing ------------ - [:email:](https://github.com/hewm2008/PopLDdecay) hewm2008@gmail.com / hewm2008@qq.com - join the QQ Group : 125293663

result.description: This release [PopLDdecay-3.43.tar.gz ](https://github.com/hewm2008/PopLDdecay/archive/v3.43.tar.gz) is stable and much fast version , with new newfuntion [-EHH] and new plot method Linux/Unix and mac-OS platform are supported at this version a) Minor changes to drawing colors b) Optimize the function of reading VCF files to improve the speed 3.42 c) Optimize the function of reading VCF files to improve the speed 3.43
result.name: PopLDdecay-3.43
